name: Okta
overview: Provision users and manage single sign-on with Okta (Enterprise only).
description: Use your Okta identity provider (IdP) to manage your LaunchDarkly users. This integration is only available for LaunchDarkly customers on an Enterprise plan.
details: Okta Single Sign-on is part of a complete identity and access management solution for organizations adopting and building for cloud and mobile who need to contain costs, fulfill user productivity targets, and avoid security risks. Provision LaunchDarkly users and manage single sign-on with Okta.
author: LaunchDarkly
